properties.developer_comment: Every feature in a geoJSON file must be part of a feature collection, it will not be read. There is no way to break up the text so try to keep your writing concise or no one will read it.
properties.name: London
properties.description: London is the capital and largest city of the United Kingdom, standing on the River Thames in southeast England.

properties.name: New York City
properties.description: New York City is the most populous city in the United States, famous for its skyline, culture, and global influence.

properties.name: Tokyo
properties.description: Tokyo is the capital of Japan and one of the world's most populous metropolitan areas, known for its modern architecture and culture.
